pages.text: Even with a list of enchantments that you can barely read anymore due to its length, there are still a few blocks that escape your gaze of superiority.$(br2)$(item)Obsidian$(), you are getting cancelled today.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Higher mining speed the harder a block is to break.$(br2)Max Level: 3$(br)Applicable to mining tools.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Fortune.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Razing by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Razing from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and experience for each additional level.
